segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, stretching up to grab cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is precariously balanced, and I can see the stool is tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of anxiety as I think about what could happen if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn’t the woman paying attention to what’s happening right behind her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there’s the girl, standing below, waiting eagerly for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear her heart racing in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a scene—a kitchen full of chaos while she remains oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR
